data.title: Towson University
data.text:
The Towson University Men's ice hockey team costs to play are $1000 for the Fall semester and $500 for the Spring. Included in the cost to play, each player receives:

Home and away game socks

Practice jersey

Practice Socks

White, black, and clear tape

Transportation and hotel for away games

Meals on overnight trips

Unlimited skate sharpening

Helmet stickers

New Players Pay a $300 Equipment fee which includes:

Player Bag

Bauer Team Gloves

Bauer Team Pants

Additional costs/equipment:

Team Under Armour apparel ($90-$600)

Sweatpants, sweatshirt, shorts, t-shirt, long sleeve shirt, duffle bag, backpack, hats, etc...

White and black helmets

Ice World opened in 1996 as a twin rink facility located in suburban Harford County, Maryland. Open year round with eight team locker rooms, a full service Snack Bar, and state of the art Pro Shop. Located 25 minutes off campus, Towson ice hockey has called Ice World home for over a decade. In 2018, the team added the team's first ever dedicated locker room.

Ice World

1300 Governor Ct. Abingdon, MD 21009
